Features.heading: Start a retrospective in seconds
Features.description: Starting or joining a retro is as easy as 1, 2, 3. It's friction-less.

1.title: Responsive
1.description: Retrospected works across all device sizes, from your iPhone to a 4K monitor.

2.title: Customisable
2.description: Retrospected is highly customisable. You can change the columns, tweak the voting system, the timer etc.

3.title: Secure
3.description: There are 2 security features for Pro users: the ability to encrypt the content locally (in browser), and the ability to lock a session so it can only be seen by specific users.

data.question: How are payments handled?
data.answer: Payments are handled by our partner, Stripe. No payment information is stored by Retrospected.

data.question: Do you give Pro licenses for free in some cases?
data.answer: If you are using this product as a charity, or you are in education, send us an email and we'll sort out a free license for you. Contact us.

data.question: Will I pay more for some features?
data.answer: We only have 2 tiers: Free and Pro. All features are unlocked when you subscribe to a Pro account.

data.question: Is it possible to pay yearly?
data.answer: You can! Simply select this option at checkout and you will get one month free per year.

data.question: Can I cancel my plan?
data.answer: Yes. The subscription can be stopped at any time, and will end at the end of your current billing month.

data.question: Is there any limit?
data.answer: There is no limit on the amount of data stored, subject to fair-use policy. On free accounts, you are limited to 40 posts.
